column2: irisk_data <-  irisk_data %>% mutate(sum = energy + ports + cultural_archeological_resources + agriculture + water_quality + wetlands)
aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group),fill = NA, color = "black", size = 0.1) +
aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill = sum)) +
aggregate <- aggregate + scale_fill_gradient(name="Risk Index", low = "lightblue", high = "red")
